Who Are We?

EBC Group is a leading managed IT service provider, delivering comprehensive and secure IT solutions tailored to the needs of UK businesses. From fully managed IT services and cloud solutions to industry leading cybersecurity, communicatins and print and data solutions, we provide end-to-end technology management to keep your business running efficiently. With over 35 years of experience, industry-leading accreditations, and a customer-first approach, we ensure your IT infrastructure is optimised, secure, and scalable. 
 
Whether you're looking to enhance productivity, strengthen cybersecurity, or streamline operations, EBC Group offers a bespoke, proactive service that empowers your business to thrive.

Your trusted manager IT service provider

Digital workplace IT solutions to transform your business.

We plan, implement and support your digital workplace technology, enabling you to run your business smoothly and securely. We work with businesses from a wide range of industries across the UK. Contact us and see why we are a trusted IT managed service provider.

JUST LAUNCHED!

Preserving the Past, Securing the Future

 

What is THEMIS?

THEMIS is a UK-based, all-in-one solution for managing legacy evidence, transforming outdated formats like VHS tapes, DVDs, paper records, and microfiche into secure, searchable digital files.

Developed by EBC Group in collaboration with UK policing, THEMIS leverages advanced digitisation technologies to empower law enforcement and modernise evidence management.

News and insights

View our news and insights
What Is A Managed IT Service Provider?

A managed IT service provider (MSP) is a third-party company that manages the information technology (IT) infrastructure and end-user systems of their clients. Usually, managed IT service providers are hired by SMEs, charities, and government organisations to carry out day-to-day management of IT services. That may include network and infrastructure management, cybersecurity or general monitoring and supplying aid with IT services.

What is the difference between managed IT service providers and IT consultancy services?

The biggest differences between managed IT services and IT support offerings are abundance and extent. Managed IT services offer continuous support to help prevent issues from occurring, whereas IT consultants from IT support services will handle specific and immediate issues individually and usually on a case-by-case basis.

What is a managed IT service provider used for?

A Managed Service Provider (MSP) software is an IT service platform that manages a predefined set of services for their clients. They will work for numerous industries and are typically outsourced to help fill a gap in the workflow.

Why choose to employ a managed IT service provider?

Managed service providers can help businesses focus on their core incentives and overarching objectives. Having an MSP employed by your business can also help to gain access to a specific set of skills that are not available immediately within the business.

Do I need a managed IT service provider?

A business might not have enough resources to deal with all of its IT issues in-house. Thatâ€™s where MSPs come in, they will; provide IT services and knowledge without dedicating a large portion of your budget to improving this skill within the business. Additionally, Managed Service Providers can support existing IT staff members when budgets are limited or when other tasks need to take priority for internal staff members.

Your trusted provider of managed IT services. We plan, implement and support your workplace technology. Enabling you to run your business smoothly and securely.
